name: Kening Zhu
content: Kening Zhu | Homepage top of page 本網站是在 Wix 建立。您也來建立網站吧！立即開始Greetings! ﻿ ﻿I am now an associate professor jointly appointed by School of Creative Media and Department of Computer Science, City Unversity of Hong Kong. My research interest lies in the field of Human-Computer Interaction (HCI), especially Multimodal and Embodied Interaction (MEI). ​ I established the MEI lab in 2017. We are particularly working on - mobile gesture interaction, - tangible/wearable user interfaces, - multimodal and embodied VR/AR, - interactive digital fabrication and rapid prototyping. I got my PhD degree in National University of Singapore under the supervision of Professor Ryohei Nakatsu and Dr. Shengdong Zhao, and my Bachelor degree on Computer Science in Huazhong University of Science and Technology. ​ I am looking forward to work with interesting and crazy scientists. I am currently looking for PhD students, Research Assistants (RAs). If you are highly motivated and interested in human computer interaction, please contact me. ﻿ Kening Zhu (Ken) ​ ​​CityU HK Scholar Page CityU HK Profile Page​bottom of page
